title: IMPORTANT EI ANNOUNCEMENT! + RHOA (Marlo's Wig Launch), RHOC, RHONJ, & RHOD Recaps!
itunes:title: IMPORTANT EI ANNOUNCEMENT! + RHOA (Marlo's Wig Launch), RHOC, RHONJ, & RHOD Recaps!
itunes:subtitle: Danny has a very exciting Everything Iconic announcement! PLUS, Kenya crashes Marlo's wig launch on RHOA, a shark attacks on RHOC, Jennifer roasts the cast on RHONJ, and RHOD finishes up their Thailand trip. RHOA: 5:50ishRHOC: 19:17ishRHONJ: ...
description:
Danny has a very exciting Everything Iconic announcement! PLUS, Kenya crashes Marlo's wig launch on RHOA, a shark attacks on RHOC, Jennifer roasts the cast on RHONJ, and RHOD finishes up their Thailand trip.


RHOA: 5:50ish

RHOC: 19:17ish

RHONJ: 31:35ish

RHOD: 42:19ish


FOR LIVE SHOWS VISIT EverythingIconic.com (tickets on sale 12/13)

TOUR T-SHIRTS: www.everythingiconic.store


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

LINKS:
